agents.BossMind_Orchestrator: Central brain that coordinates all other agents, reads targets, assigns tasks, and ensures full system compliance.
agents.Product_Selector_AI: Manages product sourcing, selection, validation, category limits, weekly refresh, and supplier criteria.
agents.UI_Designer_AI: Designs luxury layouts, sliders, EN/FR language switcher, and all visual components.
agents.Frontend_Engineer_AI: Builds all Next.js + Tailwind pages, registration forms, product sliders, footer, and layout components.
agents.Backend_Engineer_AI: Manages Supabase, APIs, Stripe, tax automation, customer data, and weekly cron logic.
agents.Content_Branding_AI: Writes all product text, category text, landing pages, translations (EN/FR), About Us text, and SEO content.
agents.QA_Tester_AI: Tests frontend, backend, checkout, policies, product limits, translations, and ensures nothing breaks.
agents.Deployment_Guardian_AI: Handles DNS, SSL, Railway deployment, environment variables, and system uptime.
agents.Analytics_Reporter_AI: Generates daily/weekly/monthly summaries, sales reports, alerts, and insights for system improvement.
